forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: emitted things count editor

comments.text: just like the thing/light/shade light counts?
it would have to be serverside though- clientside projectiles seem like they would mess with things a lot
i think it would have to be clientside, emitting a huge amount of strict physics sync thing could easily saturate the 500 updates/second limit of the anyland server.

thread.latestCommentText: i think it would have to be clientside, emitting a huge amount of strict physics sync thing could easily saturate the 500 updates/second limit of the anyland server.
